column1: #Text=Borussia Dortmund announces former Ajax coach Peter Bosz as team 's new boss
#Text=On Tuesday , German football club Borussia Dortmund ( BVB ) announced Peter Bosz as their new head coach .
#Text=Bosz , who spent one season with the Dutch Eredivisie runners-up Ajax , was to sign a two-year deal with the DFB Pokal winners BVB which runs through June 2019 .
#Text=Ajax 's assistant coach Hendrie Krüzen also was to leave the Dutch side for Dortmund .

#Text=The 53-year-old Dutch manager led the the Dutch capital club to a second place finish in the Dutch league Eredivisie , finishing just one point below Feyenoord Rotterdam and won a silver medal in the UEFA Europa League , losing 2 – 0 against Manchester United .
#Text=Bosz 's predecessor Thomas Tuchel led Dortmund to the DFB Pokal victory , third place finish in Bundesliga the last season and a qualification to next season 's Champions League group stage .
#Text=Two years ago , Tuchel succeded Jürgen Klopp and his side remained unbeaten in the home games .
#Text=On May 30 , days after winning his first trophy with Borussia Dortmund , the club announced Tuchel was sacked with immediate effect via their official website . "
